summary: This command starts mitmproxy in socks5 mode, listening on port 8050 and logs to gg.log. It also enables websocket streaming support. The user asks for domain name confirmation and doubts about IP stability.

details.comment: This command starts mitmproxy in socks5 mode, listening on port 8050 and logs to gg.log. It also enables websocket streaming support. The user asks for domain name confirmation and doubts about IP stability.
details.content:
mitmproxy --mode socks5 --listen-port 8050 -w gg.log --set stream_websocket=true
# what is the domain name for this service? are you sure the ip will not change?
